name: vibe-food-ordering
description: Vibe food ordering application - monorepo with backend, frontend, and shared packages

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:shared
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:shared
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/dist apps/*/.next
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
